item.description:
Ok lets all get out and help celebrate "Nats 50th" birthday bash. We tried to keep it a surprise but the surprise got found out, so the secret is  lets all make it a great success. Look forward to seeing as many of you that can attend "Nat we love you" Happy Birthday Girlfriend!!! There will be a DJ, appetizers, and a cash bar for drinks.. Look forward to another fun night with great friends!!

 

Hugs To All!!!!

The party will be on the 3rd. floor of the Brewery

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lets All Head out and Celebrate Appetizers & Drinks
